definition: sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
battle cry
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
inside/inner/internal/within/interior
shout/rallying cry/cheering/to shout
suona, Chinese shawm (oboe), used in festivals and processions or for military purposes/also written 鎖吶|锁呐/also called 喇叭[la3 ba5]
to wave flags and shout battle cries (idiom); to egg sb on/to give support to
sonar
suona, Chinese shawm/see 嗩吶|唢呐

sentences.english: I got to get this truck unloaded and on the way back to the ware house before dark.
sentences.chinese: 我得把这车货卸完，在天黑前赶回仓库去呐。

sentences.english: How to make suntanned skin whiten?
sentences.chinese: 怎么让晒黑的皮肤变白呐？

sentences.english: But it takes a lot of money to hire a top - notch man these days .
sentences.chinese: 现在要雇用水平这么高的人要花好多钱呐。

sentences.english: Li Hua, would you like to join us? Jon and I are going to play tennis.
sentences.chinese: 啊？你们要打网球呀，那太好了，我正在学打网球呐。

sentences.english: Sometimes we play tricks on the newlyweds to make the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 有时我们还要和新婚燕儿搞搞恶作剧以营造气氛呐。

sentences.english: My school segment exchange school is the English Oxford county your letter uncle forces inundates the elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 我校连线交流的学校是英国牛津郡翰伯勒漫呐小学。

sentences.english: "Nuh-uh, " she laughed, "I love you the most.
Conclusion Fendona was an effective insecticide in killing bedbugs .
sentences.chinese: 结论奋斗呐杀灭臭虫，是一种理想的药物。

sentences.english: No, really, that is eating money.
sentences.chinese: 不，真的，那相当于在吃钱呐。

sentences.english: I thought sorting out facts was what the grand jury and the jury are for.
sentences.chinese: 我还以为找出事实真相是大陪审团和陪审团的职责呐。

sentences.english: Thank you. I am so appreciated for having such a friend.
sentences.chinese: 很困呐，我记得你说的美容觉哈。

sentences.english: I tell you -- it really bugs me!
sentences.chinese: 我告诉你，那才叫我讨厌呐。

sentences.english: Correct me if I'm wrong, but this thing hasn't even flown yet.
sentences.chinese: 也许我瞎掰，但事情还没开朗呐。

sentences.english: I tell you —— it really bugs me!
sentences.chinese: 我告诉你，那才叫我讨厌呐。

definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
hey (to call sb)
hey (to express disagreement)
sigh (to express regret)
hey (to express agreement)
hey (to express surprise)
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
(onom.) laughing out loud
alas/oh dear
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
hey
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
(a groaning sound)
(nonverbal grunt as interjection)/OK, yeah/what?
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
Oh!
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
Oh! (exclamation of dismay etc)/see 呦呦[you1 you1]
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
